input.sentences: the bakery had done a great job on the cake .

output.sentences: I have the coolest job as head cake decorator at the local bakery.
I was asked to take the shot of the roller derby team as they gathered for a difficult victory party.
They gathered around the table to see the cake.
They gave their coach a thoughtful gift, a framed certificate "World's Best Roller Derby Coach".
When it was time for the party to end, I was told each helmet signifies their Derby name.
